name: Strava
natural_language_description: 这是 Strava 节点。主要用于: Consume Strava API

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: activity

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create
available_options: Create (值: create) - Create a new activity
Get Comments (值: getComments) - Get all activity comments
Get Kudos (值: getKudos) - Get all activity kudos
Get Laps (值: getLaps) - Get all activity laps
Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many activities
Get Streams (值: getStreams) - Get activity streams
Get Zones (值: getZones) - Get all activity zones

name.name: name
name.natural_language_description: 参数名: Name | 作用: The name of the activity | (必填项)

type.name: type
type.description: Type of activity. For example - Run, Ride etc.
type.natural_language_description: 参数名: Type | 作用: Type of activity. For example - Run, Ride etc. | (必填项)

sport_type.name: sport_type
sport_type.natural_language_description: 参数名: Sport Type | 作用: Type of sport | 默认值: Run

startDate.name: startDate
startDate.natural_language_description: 参数名: Start Date | 作用: ISO 8601 formatted date time | (必填项)

elapsedTime.name: elapsedTime
elapsedTime.natural_language_description: 参数名: Elapsed Time (Seconds) | 作用: In seconds | 默认值: 0 | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: commute (值: None) - Whether to mark as commute
description (值: None) - Description of the activity
trainer (值: None) - Whether to mark as a trainer activity

activityId.name: activityId
activityId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Activity ID | 作用: ID or email of activity | (必填项)

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: commute (值: None) - Whether to mark as commute
description (值: None) - Description of the activity
gear_id (值: None) - Identifier for the gear associated with the activity. ‘none’ clears gear from activity.
hide_from_home (值: None) - Do not publish to Home or Club feeds
name (值: None) - The name of the activity
type (值: None) - Type of activity. For example - Run, Ride etc.
trainer (值: None) - Whether to mark as a trainer activity

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50

keys.name: keys
keys.natural_language_description: 参数名: Keys | 作用: Desired stream types to return | 默认值: [] | (必填项)
